Package au.csiro.pathling.projection

package au.csiro.pathling.projection
  • Related Packages
    Package
    Description
    au.csiro.pathling
     
  • Class
    Description
    ColumnSelection
    Creates a projection from the requested columns.
    CompositeSelection
    Represents a selection that contains multiple child components.
    GroupingSelection
    Groups multiple selections together using a cross join (Cartesian product).
    ProjectedColumn
    The result of evaluating a RequestedColumn as part of a ProjectionClause.
    Projection
    An abstract representation of a projection of FHIR data, with the ability to select columns, filter the result and make use of constants.
    Projection.ProjectionConstraint
    Defines constraints that can be applied to projection results.
    ProjectionClause
    Represents a component of an abstract query for projecting FHIR data.
    ProjectionContext
    Dependencies and logic relating to the traversal of FHIRPath expressions.
    ProjectionResult
    The result of evaluating a projection, which consists of a list of ProjectedColumn objects and an intermediate Column representation that is used to produce the final result.
    RepeatSelection
    Represents a selection that performs recursive traversal of nested data structures using the repeat directive.
    RequestedColumn
    Information about a column that has been requested to be included in a projection.
    UnarySelection
    Represents a selection that wraps a single child component.
    UnionSelection
    Groups multiple selections together using a union (concatenation).
    UnnestingSelection
    Represents a selection that unnests a nested data structure, with either inner or outer join semantics.
